questions.question: What was the action of Vīrabhadra with the head of Dakṣa's sacrifice?

options.A: He offered it as a gift to Lord Śiva
options.B: He threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire as an oblation
options.C: He kept it as a symbol of victory
options.D: He buried it in the sacrificial arena

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire, offering it as an oblation'

questions.question: What was the appearance of the followers of Lord Śiva?

options.B: Short stature and shark-like bodies, blackish and yellowish

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 | QUOTE: 'their bodies appeared to be like those of sharks, blackish and yellowish'

questions.question: Who was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.5 | QUOTE: 'that black person was the personified anger of the Supreme Personality of Godhead'

questions.question: Who arrested Bhṛgu Muni?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni'

questions.question: What was the consequence of the actions of the followers of Lord Śiva?

options.A: The sacrifice of Dakṣa was completed successfully

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'In this way the followers of Lord Śiva devastated all the arrangements for sacrifice'

questions.question: What was the reaction of the people when they saw the dust storm?

options.B: They were confused and conjectured about its origin
options.C: They were fearful and ran away
options.D: They were indifferent and continued with their daily activities

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.8 | QUOTE: 'Conjecturing on the origin of the storm, they said...'

questions.question: Who was arrested by Vīrabhadra?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa'

questions.question: What was the destination of the followers of Lord Śiva after they devastated the sacrifice?

options.C: The abode of Lord Śiva, Kailāsa

questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'they departed for their master's abode, Kailāsa'

questions.question: What was the nature of the followers of Lord Śiva?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire'

questions.question: Who was Caṇḍeśa, according to the text?
questions.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Another follower, who was named Caṇḍeśa, arrested Pūṣā'

meta.query: provide answer from chapter 5 in canto 4 in sb
meta.refined_query:
Here is the refined search query:

`SB 4.5.*`

This query will search for all passages in Chapter 5 of Canto 4 in the Srimad Bhagavatam, which should provide relevant content for creating quiz questions.
